sourcesContent:
import { useReducer } from "react"; import "./style.css"; /* action type constant */ const ACTIONS = { ADD_DIGIT: "add-digit", CLEAR: "clear", DEL_DIGIT: "delete-digit", CHOOSE_OPERATION: "choose-operation", EVALUATE: "evaluate", }; /* Reducer function to update state object */ function reducer(state, { type, payload }) { console.log(state); switch (type) { case ACTIONS.ADD_DIGIT: return { ...state, currentOperand: state.currentOperand + payload }; case ACTIONS.MINUS: return state; case ACTIONS.MULTIPLY: return state; case ACTIONS.DIVIDE: return state; default: return state; } } /* UI component */ export default function App() { const [{ currentOperand, previousOperand, operation }, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, {}); return (
{previousOperand} {operation}
{currentOperand}
); }
